#### Using `ggplot()`
```{r} 
d <- ggplot(diamonds, aes(x=carat, y=price))
d + geom_point()
d + geom_point(aes(colour = carat))
d + geom_point(aes(colour = carat)) + scale_colour_brewer()
```
